rooms.Name: Street
rooms.Description:
Oops.  You've reached a dead end, literally.  There are bodies laying
everywhere.  The smell is horrible...you'd better leave.

rooms.Name: Street
rooms.Description:
You are standing on a brightly lit street.  All around you, drug deals are
going on and bodies are laying in the street.  You wonder why the area has
gotten this bad.  Suddenly a cop car drives by and throws a doughnut box out
the window.  You sigh and realize you'd better leave before you get shot.

rooms.Name: Stairs
rooms.Description:
You are standing on some beautiful marble steps that lead up into the
Manhattan Court House. While you are standing here admiring the view,
you hear a blood-curdling scream from the south.  You better hurry up
the stairs before you are the next victim!

rooms.Name: Entrance to the Court House
rooms.Description:
You stand immediately before the entrance of one of the city's municipal
court buildings. It was built back during the heyday of the roaring 20's,
back when the city really had money to spend and public buildings of all
kinds were being erected. It must have looked good back then, but today,
with the onset of time, weather, smog and acid rain, it looks worn and
aged. The granite facade is bleak, and the marbled floors are scuffed.
Yet the city still conducts business here, and court is always in session.

Exits.Description:
Before you is the main double door entrance to the municipal court
building. Judges hold court inside, city clerks keep all kinds of records.

rooms.Name: A Hall in the Court House
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of the hall.  Directly north of you is the
court room.  Since court is in session now, not many people are lingering
in the hallway.  The smell of food is coming from somewhere to the east.
Yummy! Go see where the smell is coming from.

rooms.Name: A Hall in the Court House
rooms.Description:
This is one of the many hallways in the court house. Court is now in 
session, so there are not many people lingering in the hallway. The
only exit is east, towards the court room.

rooms.Name: A Hall in the Court House
rooms.Description:
This is one of the many hallways in the court house. Court is now in 
session, so there are not many people lingering in the hallway. The
only exit is east, towards the court room.

rooms.Name: A Hall in the Court House
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of a hallway.  Not many people are here,
since court is in session.  The hall continues to the east, and somewhere
to the west is the court room.  A wonderful aroma is drifting from the
south, making you drool.  Could it be week-old meatloaf?

rooms.Name: A Hall in the Court House
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of a hall in front of the court room.  Not
many people are here, since court is in session.  The hall continues to the
east and west.  Somewhere to the west is the court room and the cafeteria.
The smell of food is overwhelming here.

rooms.Name: A Bend in the Hall
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the bend of the hallway.  To the west is the court room
and the Cafeteria.  To the distant north, you can see a stairwell, some
pay phones, and a bathroom.  There also seems to be a lot of commotion
to the north.  From what you can understand, Bull has lost a prisoner once
again. Oh no, poor Bull!

rooms.Name: A Hall in the Court House
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of the hall that is parallel to the court
room. The commotion gets louder as you go north, so you wonder where it
is coming from.  To the south is a bend in the hall, while the hall 
continues to the north.  In the distant north you can see a set of stairs,
a bathroom, and some pay phones.

rooms.Name: A Hall in the Court House
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of a hall that runs parallel to the court
room.  To the south you notice a bend in the hallway, while to the north
you notice a set or stairs and a bathroom.  There is a lot of noise coming
from the north for some reason.  Go check it out!

rooms.Name: A Hall in the Court House
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of the hall that runs parallel to the court
room. As you look to the east, you notice a set of stairs that leads down
to the holding cells.  It seems pretty noisy here, and you wonder if you
should venture down the stairs or not.  To the distant north you see some
pay phones and a bathroom.  The hall continues to the north and south.

rooms.Name: A Hall in the Court House
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of a hall that runs parallel to the court
room.  As you walk down the hall, you notice a gorgeous painting on the
wall.  Upon inspection of the painting, though, you realize that it is
not a painting at all but a cheap replica.  The hall continues south and
north.  To the distant north you see a bathroom and some phones, while to
the south you see some stairs.

rooms.Name: A Hall in the Court House
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of the hall that parallels the court room.
The commotion seems to be getting louder as you go north.  Sheesh, it
sounds like someone is yelling.  The hall continues to the north and to the
south.  In the distant south you can see some stairs, while to the north
you see a bathroom and some public pay phones.

rooms.Name: A Hall in the Court House
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of the hall that runs parallel to the court
room.  There is a lot of commotion here for some reason.  Apparently Bull
still hasn't found the criminal that he lost.  To the east you see a men's
bathroom, while the hall continues to the north and south.

rooms.Name: A Bend in the Hall
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of the hall which turns west and south.
There is a cute little boy here that is shining peoples' shoes.  As he
notices you, he asks you if you want your shoes shined.  You decide to
have him shine your shoes, and then realize that they haven't looked 
this shiny in a long time.  There are pay phones to the east, while the
hall continues to the west and south.

rooms.Name: A Hall Behind the Court Room
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of the hall behind the court room.  You
hear some moaning coming from the west.  What could be making that noise?
To the east you see a boy shining shoes, and to the distant east you see
some pay phones.  The hall continues to the east and west.

rooms.Name: A Hall Behind the Court Room
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of a hall behind the court room.  As you
are standing here, you hear some strange noises coming from the closet
north of you.  Wow, someone in the closet just screamed.  You wonder if
it is safe to venture north.  South of you is an aisle leading into
the court room, while the hall continues to the east and west.

rooms.Name: A Hall Behind the Court Room
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of the hall behind the court room.  There
is a bench here, as well as an ash tray.  It seems to be busy in the
hall for some reason.  Court is probably in recess for a few minutes.
You can go east or west in the hallway.

rooms.Name: A Hall Behind the Court Room
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of the hall behind the court room.  The
hall seems quite busy right now for some reason.  As you glance south,
you notice Mac's desk and distantly you see the rest of the court room.
The hall continues to the east, while to the west you see Harry's office.

rooms.Name: The Hall Outside Harry's Office
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of the hall behind the court room.  The
hall seems to end here at Harry's office door for some reason.  Strange,
Harry's door is open.  You look into his room, and you cannot see him.
But, you do see a safe sitting in the middle of the floor.  You can go
north into Harry's office or return east into the hall.

rooms.Name: Harry's Office
rooms.Description:
Upon entering Harry's office, you are overwhelmed by his awesome decorating
abilities. On the wall above his desk is a framed picture of Marilyn
Monroe, and on the stand next to his desk is a picture of Mel Torme.  You
sit down on his big, comfortable leather couch as you glance around the
rest of the room.  Harry has an armadillo on his book shelves and a 
computer on his desk, neither of which a proper judge can be without.  You
make a mental note to yourself to ask Harry who his decorator is.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The computer is Harry's only downfall that is evident in the room.  He
bought a *gasp* Mac!  Well, at least he has training wheels if he ever
needs them...  You start to wonder if _this_ is the kind of things
that the taxpayers' money is being squandered on.

This stuffed armadillo is one of Harry's most prized possessions.  You
better not misplace it, or there will be h*ll to pay when Harry finds
out about it.  Hmm, it _is_ cute, isn't it...

rooms.Name: Inside Harry's Safe
rooms.Description:
You have entered Harry's safe.  It looks like another one of Harry's tricks
has gone awry.  It's a good thing that you opened the safe when you did,
because Harry was running out of air.  As you are standing here, the safe
door slams shut.  Wait!  Where is that slight breeze coming from?  Hopefully
you can find out where the secret is hidden.

Exits.Description: The safe door appears to be extremely sturdy.

rooms.Name: Hall Closet
rooms.Description:
This is the closet that Dan Fielding usually goes to during recesses in
court and during his lunch hour.  Looking around, you get the feeling that
this closet is used quite a lot.  Dan apparently brings his many girls
here for a quickie, because you see some of his toys lying about.

rooms.Name: Pay Phones
rooms.Description:
These pay phones are here for the use of the public.  Upon looking at the
wall, you notice a phone number and the following message: "For a great
time, call Dan at 555-1212."  As you look closer, you realize that Dan
was the one that wrote that message!  Apparently he is more desperate
than we had thought.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The phones appear to be broken.  It looks as if someone put some gum in
the coin slots.  How gross!

rooms.Name: Men's Bathroom
rooms.Description:
Upon entering this bathroom, you notice that it is just like every other
public bathroom that you have been in.  Along one wall are some urinals.
There are some stalls along another wall, while on the third wall there
are some sinks with a few mirrors.  The walls are also painted in that
wonderful institution blue color that everyone loves so much.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The urinals are very dirty-looking, so I would not advise you to use one.
There also seems to be a man handcuffed to the one urinal.  Hmm, I wonder
how he got here!

rooms.Name: Holding Cell
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a 5' X 5' room.  There are no windows, and there is
a huge steel door blocking your way out of here.  As you glance around
your "new home," you see some dirty old cots with gross-looking stains 
on them.  There is also a smelly stained toilet, which reassures you
even less.  Upon closer inspection, you notice that the water coming
out of the sink is brown.  You better hope you get out of here soon!

Exits.Description: The steel door leads back into the hallway.

rooms.Name: Holding Cell
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a 5' X 5' room.  There are no windows, and there is
a huge steel door blocking your way out of here.  As you glance around
your "new home," you see some dirty old cots with gross-looking stains 
on them.  There is also a smelly stained toilet, which reassures you
even less.  Upon closer inspection, you notice that the water coming
out of the sink is brown.  You better hope you get out of here soon!

Exits.Description: The steel door leads back into the hallway.

rooms.Name: Outside the Cells
rooms.Description:
You are standing outside one of the holding cells.  As you look west, you
notice someone in the cell.  They appear to be dressed as an elf.  Isn't
Halloween over already?  You can go south or enter the cell to the west.

Exits.Description: You see a steel door, which opens into a holding cell.

rooms.Name: Outside the Cells
rooms.Description:
You are standing outside one of the holding cells.  As you look west, you
notice someone in the cell.  They appear to be dressed as an elf.  Isn't
Halloween over already?  You can go back up the stairs, enter the cell to
the west, or go north towards another holding cell.

Exits.Description: You see a steel door, which opens into a holding cell.

rooms.Name: Stairs
rooms.Description:
These stais lead down to a place where few want to venture... the holding
cells! As you descend to the cells, you hear a lot of commotion coming
up the stairs.  You hear some wolf-whistles, and it sounds like someone is
banging something against the cell door.  Be careful if you venture further
down, because the people down there are not the most reputable people.

rooms.Name: The Back of the Cafeteria
rooms.Description:
Here is where the cooks prepare the oh-so-delicious food that is usually
found in the cafeteria.  As you are standing here, you smell something
pretty raunchy.  Hmm, could it be the meatloaf left over from last week?

rooms.Name: Cafeteria
rooms.Description:
In the middle of the room is a salad bar and the cash register.  The cake
on the dessert tray has an imprint in it that suspiciously looks as if
someone's face was smashed into it.  There are also a few tables here
where you can sit and have some coffee.

rooms.Name: Cafeteria
rooms.Description:
This cafeteria seems to be like the typical public cafeteria.  You notice
many people sitting here, just drinking coffee.  There is also a little
news stand here, which is run by Jack.  He seems to have everything
from a roll of Tums to the latest issue of Cosmo.

rooms.Name: The Peanut Gallery
rooms.Description:
A few people are sitting on the wooden benches here.  As you sit down
with them for a few minutes, you realize that the benches are extremely
uncomfortable. There also seems to be some graffiti on the benches.
How rude!  You wonder how people can sit here for a few hours at a time.

rooms.Name: The Peanut Gallery
rooms.Description:
A few people are sitting on the wooden benches here.  As you sit down
with them for a few minutes, you realize that the benches are extremely
uncomfortable. There also seems to be some graffiti on the benches.
How rude!  You wonder how people can sit here for a few hours at a time.

rooms.Name: An Aisle in the Court Room
rooms.Description:
This aisle leads to the front of the court room. To the east and west of you
are some wooden benches. There is a lot of noise coming from the east and
west. Maybe you should go investigate. Try not to fall on the... whatever
it is... in the middle of the aisle.

rooms.Name: The Peanut Gallery
rooms.Description:
A few people are sitting on the wooden benches here.  As you sit down
with them for a few minutes, you realize that the benches are extremely
uncomfortable. There also seems to be some graffiti on the benches.
How rude!  You wonder how people can sit here for a few hours at a time.

rooms.Name: The Peanut Gallery
rooms.Description:
A few people are sitting on the wooden benches here.  As you sit down
with them for a few minutes, you realize that the benches are extremely
uncomfortable. There also seems to be some graffiti on the benches.
How rude!  You wonder how people can sit here for a few hours at a time.

rooms.Name: The Peanut Gallery
rooms.Description:
A few people are sitting on the wooden benches here.  As you sit down
with them for a few minutes, you realize that the benches are extremely
uncomfortable. There also seems to be some graffiti on the benches.
How rude!  You wonder how people can sit here for a few hours at a time.

rooms.Name: The Peanut Gallery
rooms.Description:
A few people are sitting on the wooden benches here.  As you sit down
with them for a few minutes, you realize that the benches are extremely
uncomfortable. There also seems to be some graffiti on the benches.
How rude!  You wonder how people can sit here for a few hours at a time.

rooms.Name: An Aisle in the Court Room
rooms.Description:
The aisle continues north to the front of the court room.  To the east and
west of you are some wooden benches.  There is a lot of noise coming from
the east and west.  Maybe you should go investigate.  Try not to fall on
the stuff in the middle of the aisle.

ExtraDescs.Description:
This pile of... stuff... in the middle of the aisle contails some gross
oddities that make you want to puke.  The stench from the pile makes
you want to high-tail it out of here.

rooms.Name: The Peanut Gallery
rooms.Description:
A few people are sitting on the wooden benches here.  As you sit down
with them for a few minutes, you realize that the benches are extremely
uncomfortable. There also seems to be some graffiti on the benches.
How rude!  You wonder how people can sit here for a few hours at a time.

rooms.Name: The Peanut Gallery
rooms.Description:
A few people are sitting on the wooden benches here.  As you sit down
with them for a few minutes, you realize that the benches are extremely
uncomfortable. There also seems to be some graffiti on the benches.
How rude!  You wonder how people can sit here for a few hours at a time.

rooms.Name: Christine's Desk
rooms.Description:
This is Christine Sullivan's desk while she is at court.  Her desk is 
extremely neat, which comes as no surprise to you.  Her desk has been 
polished recently, and you can actually see your reflection on it.
Sheesh, talk about being anal!

rooms.Name: An Aisle Between the Desks
rooms.Description:
You are in the aisle between Christine Sullivan's and Dan Fielding's desks.
To the distant north is Harry's Bench.  Strange, but Harry looks younger
than you thought he would.  You can go south to the Peanut Gallery, east
to Dan's Desk, west to Christine's Desk, or north towards the bench.

rooms.Name: Dan's Desk
rooms.Description:
This is Dan Fielding's desk while he is at court.  His desk has papers all
over it, which makes you wonder how he can ever find anything.  Upon closer
inspection, you notice a few of Dan's most prized possessions lying on
his desk.  Apparently he is planning on using them later tonight...

ExtraDescs.Description:
You notice some handcuffs, leather restraints, blindfolds, a whip of some
sort, whipped cream, a few different oils, and some other objects which
make you shudder with anticipation.

rooms.Name: An Aisle in front of Christine's Desk
rooms.Description:
Directly behind you is Christine's desk.  That's strange, the smell of Lemon
Pledge is drifting from the south.  To the north is Mac's desk, while to 
the distant north you can see the hall behind the court room.  The aisle also
continues to the east.

rooms.Name: An Aisle in the Middle of the Court Room
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the aisle in the middle of the court room.  To the 
distant north is Harry's bench, while to the distant south you can see
the Peanut Gallery.  Somewhat to the east you can see the court
stenographer, and somewhat to the west you can see Mac's desk.  The 
aisle continues to the east and west.

rooms.Name: An Aisle in Front of Dan's Desk
rooms.Description:
You are standing in front of Dan Fielding's desk.  To the north you can
see the court stenographer, while to the direct north you can see the
hall behind the court room.  As you glance behind you, you see Dan
stripping you naked with his eyes.  What a pervert!  The aisle continues
to the west.

rooms.Name: An Aisle Leading to the Hall
rooms.Description:
You are standing in an aisle that leads to the hall.  Directly to the north
you see Mac Robinson's desk, while to the distant north you see people
moving around in the hall behind the court room.  As you are standing here,
you admire the nice wax job that Art did on the floor.  Just make sure
you don't fall.  The continues to the east.

rooms.Name: Before the Bench
rooms.Description:
You are standing before the bench.  You see a Harry look-alike sitting in
Harry's chair to the north.  To the south you see the aisle that leads 
to the back of the court room.  To the east is the court stenographer,
Lisette Hocheiser.  The aisle continues to the west.

rooms.Name: Court Stenographer
rooms.Description:
You are standing where the court stenographer, Lisette Hocheiser, usually
sits. The only objects here are a chair and a big pack of bubble gum 
(strawberry flavored, of course).  To the east you can see the jury box,
while to the distant north you can see the hall behind the court room. 
The aisle continues to the west.

rooms.Name: Mac's Desk
rooms.Description:
Mac's desk seems to be somewhat cluttered, because it contains most of 
the files for tonight's cases.  As you glance at the pile, you notice
that some of the people seem to have a high recidivism rate because their
files are a few inches thick.  Yikes!  Even though there is a lot of stuff
on Mac's desk, he always seems to know where everything is.  Harry's bench
is to the east, the hall is to the north, and to the south is an aisle.

rooms.Name: Harry's Bench
rooms.Description:
You are standing behind the bench that Judge Harold T. Stone sits at when
Manhattan Criminal Court is in session.  His desk is pretty neat, and has
the normal stuff that a judge has, such as a gavel and a gavel cozy.  You
also notice some of Harry's practical joke props, such as his rubber chicken
and his hand buzzer.  Strange, there is a Harry look-alike sitting here.
You can go west towards Mac's desk or east to an aisle.

rooms.Name: An Aisle Leading into the Hall
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of an aisle that leads into the hall.  The
floors are very shiny, as if Art has recently waxed them.  To the west is 
Harry's bench, while to the south is where the court stenographer sits.
To the distant north, you see a closet door.

rooms.Name: Jury Box
rooms.Description:
Since there is no jury in this criminal court, criminals sometimes wait
here until they are ready to be transported.  As you look around, you
notice that this part of the court room is pretty messy.  There are 
cigarette butts thrown around haphazardly, probably by Selma.

rooms.Name: Jury Box
rooms.Description:
Since there is no jury in this criminal court, criminals sometimes wait
here until they are ready to be transported.  As you look around, you
notice that this part of the court room is pretty messy.  There are 
cigarette butts thrown around haphazardly, and there are also a few candy
bar wrappers.  Looks like Roz is cheating on her diet again...
